mapper.insert: insert into cart (status, cartno, id, isbn, title, price, amount) values (#{status},cart_seq.nextval,#{id},#{isbn},#{title},#{price},#{amount})
mapper.select: select cartno, title, price, isbn, sum(amount) amount, sum(price*amount) money from cart where id=#{id} and status = '장바구니' group by cartno, title, price, isbn
select nvl(sum(price * amount) ,0) from cart where status = '장바구니'
mapper.delete: delete from cart where status='장바구니' and isbn=#{isbn} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where id=#{id} and isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.update: update cart set amount=amount+#{amount} where id=#{id} and isbn=#{isbn}
update cart set amount=#{amount} where id=#{id} and isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.select: select discount from customerclass where name = (select customerclass from customer where id = #{ id })
